name: Mega Mall Mogul Clicker
description:
Mega Mall Mogul Clicker is an Idle Clicker game where you expand your emporium! You start with a small lemonade stand, that you manage yourself. But what if you hire one of your friends to run that stand, and you buy another one? And what if after that your started an Ice-cream Parlor? Or a Book shop?

Mega Mall Mogul Clicker is a relaxing game, with no timers or deadlines. Enjoy your time and the amazing artwork!

All profits made with this game will be used to make our upcoming big game "Urban Gardener Simulator"!
